Pro-Palestinian group sues Canada over military exports to IsraelPro-Palestinian and human rights advocates in Canada on Tuesday filed a lawsuit against the federal government to stop it from allowing companies to export military goods and technology to Israel. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:41:05 GMT QCKDTLPON5NKHK3NLWJAWHWGU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/pro-palestinian-group-sues-canada-over-israeli-military-exports-2024-03-05/Ismail Shakil世界美洲
Russian spy chief calls Macron's comments about NATO soldiers in Ukraine dangerousFrench President Emmanuel Macron's comments on possibly sending NATO soldiers to Ukraine are pushing the world to the brink of nuclear war, Russia's Foreign Intelligence Service (SVR) chief was quoted as saying on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:10:13 GMT JYFBKOIA4BPJREJFZKXWFA2DD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-spy-chief-calls-macrons-comments-about-nato-soldiers-ukraine-dangerous-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
Brazil's ex-military chiefs told police Bolsonaro discussed coup in 2022, sources sayThe former heads of Brazil's Army and Air Force have confirmed to federal police that ex-President Jair Bolsonaro discussed a draft decree to prevent the handover of power after the 2022 election, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:33:29 GMT LZ4PRFZXKBMZ7FM36H3AXMGVOA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-ex-military-chiefs-told-police-bolsonaro-discussed-coup-2022-sources-say-2024-03-05/Ricardo Brito世界美洲
Yemen's Houthis say they target two US warships in Red SeaYemen's Iran-aligned Houthis carried out a military operation in which they targeted two U.S. warship destroyers in the Red Sea, the group's military spokesman, Yahya Sarea, said in a televised speech on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:27:03 GMT ZPJAPROOT5KF3DPCAGSNE4CGUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthis-say-they-target-two-us-warships-red-sea-2024-03-05/Reuters世界中东地区
Explainer: Famine looms in Gaza - how will the world know it has arrived?The United Nations has warned that widespread famine in the Gaza Strip is "almost inevitable" without action. A formal conclusion that famine has arrived in the coastal enclave of 2.3 million people could come next week. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:25:55 GMT FBYJH2KNYRMVTLTZQA3Q43RROY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/famine-looms-gaza-how-will-the-world-know-it-has-arrived-2024-03-05/Michelle Nichols世界中东地区
UN agency says attempt to resume northern Gaza food deliveries 'largely unsuccessful'The United Nations' food agency said it was "largely unsuccessful" in its attempt on Tuesday to resume deliveries to northern Gaza which is nearing famine. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:19:00 GMT WRATQOVJBNLILES5AVQIAJTFZU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-agency-says-attempted-resume-northern-gaza-food-deliveries-largely-unsuccessful-2024-03-05/Reuters世界中东地区
Talks on ending Lebanon-Israel border fighting to begin in Ramadan, Lebanese PM saysIndirect talks to end hostilities along the Lebanese-Israeli border will begin during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan which starts next week, Lebanon's caretaker prime minister Najib Mikati said on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 19:54:31 GMT EJXFSJMB5JMENIJXTG4AS7VQQU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/talks-ending-lebanon-israeli-border-hostilities-begin-ramadan-lebanese-pm-says-2024-03-05/Reuters世界中东地区
Venezuela sets presidential election for July 28Venezuela will hold its presidential election on July 28, the head of the national electoral council said on Tuesday, though uncertainty remains over who will be the opposition coalition's candidate with President Nicolas Maduro expected to seek another term. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 19:52:20 GMT DCLL2G2PNRLDHGDCL6TJH6GFPM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuela-presidential-election-to-be-held-july-28-electoral-council-2024-03-05/Vivian Sequera, Mayela Armas世界美洲
Bulgaria's PM resigns, as agreed, amid some coalition confusionBulgarian Prime Minister Nikolai Denkov resigned on Tuesday, paving the way for his coalition partner, the centre-right GERB party, to lead the government as agreed following last year's elections, but there was some dispute as to what happens next. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 19:20:16 GMT 5UA2TV6DLRKSNHV64CONNECT26M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bulgaria-pm-resigns-agreed-amid-some-coalition-confusion-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
Cuba turns off some public lighting as energy crisis worsensCuba has switched off nearly three-quarters of public lighting during peak hours to cope with a growing energy shortage, state media reported on Tuesday, as hopes to reverse a deepening economic crisis dim. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 19:19:30 GMT IUDXS6FN2JK2TLF3XSFUSF3AAM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-turns-off-some-public-lighting-energy-crisis-worsens-2024-03-05/Nelson Acosta, Marc Frank商业活力
Blinken tells Israel that it must act urgently to boost Gaza aidU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Israeli war cabinet minister Benny Gantz at their meeting on Tuesday in a "quite frank" way that Israel needs to act urgently to allow more aid into Gaza, State Department spokesperson Matthew Miller said. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 19:17:17 GMT 2SNLOJ5QNFMZXFGJDJBAEIO5RU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/blinking-tells-israel-that-it-must-act-urgently-boost-gaza-aid-2024-03-05/Simon Lewis, Humeyra Pamuk世界中东地区
